mapper.sql: a.id as "mid", a.autoid as "autoid", a.ccode as "ccode", a.ivouchrowno as "ivouchrowno", a.ddate as "ddate", a.cvencode as "cvencode", a.cvenabbname as "cvenabbname", a.cvenname as "cvenname", a.cdepname as "cdepname", a.cdepcode as "cdepcode", a.cmaker as "cmaker", a.cpersonname as "cpersonname", a.cwhcode as "cwhcode", a.cwhname as "cwhname", a.cinvcode as "cinvcode", a.cinvname as "cinvname", a.cinvstd as "cinvstd", a.cinvm_unit as "cinvmunit", a.iquantity as "iquantity", a.iinvexchrate as "iinvexchrate", a.vouchstate as "vouchstate", a.cbcloser as "cbcloser", a.cInvDefine1 as "cInvDefine1", a.cposcode as "cposcode", a.cbatch as "cbatch", a.dpdate as "dpdate", a.cordercode as "cordercode", a.irowno as "irowno"
